title: Propagation System
description: GPU-driven propagation with culling, millions of instances at high FPS. Unity + Compute + Forward Lit.
detailedContent:
Propagation System - Deep Dive

This system leverages GPU instancing and compute shaders to efficiently render millions of environmental assets. Key features include erosion-aware placement, dynamic noise fields for variation, and advanced frustum and occlusion culling techniques. It supports batched material slots and an artist-friendly layer graph for intuitive control. The system also integrates LOD (Level of Detail) and impostors for performance optimization, along with streaming chunks for large-scale environments.

  • Technology: Unity, C#, Compute Shaders, Shader Graph
  • Features: GPU Instancing, Frustum Culling, Occlusion Culling, LOD, Impostors, Streaming Chunks, Erosion-aware Placement
  • Performance: Achieves high FPS with millions of instances.

title: Chrono Sphere
description: Time-warp sphere combining motion vectors + signed distance fields for refraction distortions.
detailedContent:
Chrono Sphere - Visual Breakdown

The Chrono Sphere is a complex visual effect that simulates a time-warp distortion. It combines real-time motion vectors with signed distance fields (SDFs) to create dynamic refraction and distortion effects. The core of the effect involves animated Voronoi patterns, curl-noise advection for fluid motion, and a stencil portal mask to define its boundaries. Impact frames are driven by a custom LUT (Look-Up Table) for precise timing and visual punch.

  • Technology: Unity, Shader Graph, VFX Graph
  • Techniques: Motion Vectors, Signed Distance Fields (SDF), Voronoi Noise, Curl Noise Advection, Stencil Masking, LUT-driven Animation
  • Effect: Dynamic time-warp and refraction distortion.

title: GPU Scene Generator
description: Artist-friendly, data-driven scene generation with pluggable shaders and material inheritance.
detailedContent:
GPU Scene Generator - Tool Overview

This tool provides an artist-friendly, data-driven solution for generating complex scenes entirely on the GPU. It features a graph-based rule system for defining placement logic and modular emitters for various asset types. The system supports on-GPU LOD management and a streaming tilepool for efficient handling of vast environments. It's designed with extensibility in mind, allowing for pluggable shaders and material inheritance to easily customize visual output. Comprehensive documentation is provided for both artists and technical users.

  • Technology: Unity, C#, Compute Shaders, Custom Editor Tools
  • Features: GPU Instancing, Frustum Culling, Occlusion Culling, LOD, Impostors, Streaming Chunks, Erosion-aware Placement
  • Performance: Achieves high FPS with millions of instances.

title: Procedural Terrain Generator
description: A tool for generating infinite, detailed terrains with biome support.
detailedContent:
Procedural Terrain Generator - Overview

This tool creates vast, procedurally generated terrains with support for multiple biomes, dynamic LOD, and erosion simulation. It uses a combination of Perlin noise, Worley noise, and custom algorithms to create realistic and varied landscapes. The system is highly optimized for performance, enabling large-scale environments without significant overhead.

  • Technology: Unity, C#, Compute Shaders
  • Features: Infinite Terrain, Biome Generation, Dynamic LOD, Erosion Simulation
  • Scalability: Designed for large open-world games.

title: Volumetric Fog & Lighting
description: Real-time volumetric fog and lighting system for atmospheric effects.
detailedContent:
Volumetric Fog & Lighting - Details

An advanced real-time volumetric fog and lighting system that enhances atmospheric depth and realism. It supports dynamic light scattering, god rays, and interaction with various light sources.The system is optimized to run efficiently on modern GPUs, providing stunning visual quality without a heavy performance cost. Customizable parameters allow for a wide range of atmospheric effects, from dense mist to subtle haze.

  • Technology: Unity, C#, Custom Shaders
  • Features: Real-time Volumetric Fog, God Rays, Dynamic Light Scattering, Performance Optimized
  • Visuals: Enhances atmospheric depth and realism.

title: Custom Post-Processing Stack
description: An extensible post-processing framework with custom effects.
detailedContent:
Custom Post-Processing Stack - Features

A modular and extensible post-processing framework built from scratch, allowing for a wide array of custom visual effects. Includes effects like chromatic aberration, bloom, depth of field, and custom color grading. Designed for easy integration and expansion, enabling artists to create unique visual styles for their projects. Optimized for performance and compatibility with various rendering pipelines.

  • Technology: Unity, C#, Custom Shaders
  • Features: Modular Effects, Chromatic Aberration, Bloom, Depth of Field, Color Grading
  • Customization: Easy to extend with new effects.

Light Burst VFX

The shader supports customizable liquid color, viscosity, and fill levels, providing a convincing visual representation of fluids in game environments.
